TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit CultureAndRegionInfoBuilder extends System.Object

summary.span: 定義新的自訂文化特性，或根據其他文化特性和國家/地區的自訂文化特性。

span.span: Defines a custom culture that is new or based on another culture and country/region.

summary.span: 自訂的文化特性可安裝在電腦上，隨後供電腦上執行的應用程式使用。

span.span: The custom culture can be installed on a computer and subsequently used by any application that is running on that computer.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別包含特定文化特性資訊，例如相關聯的語言、 次語言、 國家/地區、 日曆和文化特性的慣例。The class holds culture-specific information, such as the associated language, sublanguage, country/region, calendar, and cultural conventions. 這個類別也會提供特定文化特性的執行個體， ， ，和類別，所需的特定文化特性的作業，例如大小寫、 格式化和剖析日期和數字項目，以及比較字串。This class also provides culture-specific instances of the , , , and classes, which are required for culture-specific operations such as casing, formatting and parsing dates and numbers, and comparing strings. 根據預設，.NET Framework 支援代表一組預先定義的文化特性的物件。By default, the .NET Framework supports objects that represent a predefined set of cultures. 如需這些文化特性的清單，請參閱 < [ 國家語言支援 (NLS) API 參考](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=200048)在 Go Global Developer Center。For a list of these cultures, see the [National Language Support (NLS) API Reference](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=200048) at the Go Global Developer Center. 類別可讓您建立第一次，或會覆寫預先定義的文化特性的自訂文化特性。The class enables you to create a custom culture that is completely new or that overrides a predefined culture. 當安裝自訂的文化特性，並在特定電腦上註冊時，它會變成無法區別預先定義物件，和可具現化，並使用這些物件一樣。When a custom culture is installed and registered on a particular computer, it becomes indistinguishable from predefined objects, and can be instantiated and used just like those objects. > [!IMPORTANT] > 請注意，類別位於名為 sysglobl.dll 組件。Note that the class is found in an assembly named sysglobl.dll. 已成功編譯使用這種類型的程式碼會要求您新增 sysglobl.dll 的參考。Successfully compiling code that uses this type requires that you add a reference to sysglobl.dll. 只能由該電腦具有系統管理權限的使用者，可以在電腦上註冊的自訂文化特性。A custom culture can be registered on a computer only by a user who has administrative rights on that computer. 因此，應用程式通常並未建立及安裝自訂的文化特性。Consequently, apps typically do not create and install custom cultures. 相反地，您可以使用類別來建立一種特殊用途的工具，系統管理員可用來建立、 安裝及註冊自訂的文化特性。Instead, you can use the class to create a special-purpose tool that an administrator can use to create, install, and register a custom culture. 自訂文化特性的電腦上註冊之後，您可以使用建立自訂的文化特性的執行個體，就像您一樣的預先定義的文化特性的應用程式中的類別。After the custom culture is registered on a computer, you can use the class in your app to create instances of the custom culture just as you would for a predefined culture. 如果您剖析產生自訂的文化特性的日期和時間字串，您應該使用或是方法，而非或方法，以改善剖析作業會成功的機率。If you parse date and time strings generated for a custom culture, you should use the or method instead of the or method to improve the probability that the parse operation will succeed. 自訂文化特性的日期和時間字串可以是很複雜，因此很難剖析。A date and time string for a custom culture can be complicated and therefore difficult to parse. 和方法嘗試剖析的字串與數個隱含的剖析模式，其中都可能會失敗。The and methods try to parse a string with several implicit parse patterns, all of which might fail. 方法中，相較之下，需要應用程式明確地指定一或多個實際的剖析模式可能會成功。The method, in contrast, requires the application to explicitly designate one or more exact parse patterns that are likely to succeed. ## 定義和建立自訂的文化特性Defining and Creating a Custom Culture 您使用定義和命名自訂文化特性的類別。You use the class to define and name a custom culture. 自訂的文化特性可能是全新的文化特性、 新的文化特性為基礎的現有的文化特性 （也就是補充的文化特性） 或取代現有的.NET Framework 文化特性的文化特性。The custom culture can be an entirely new culture, a new culture that is based on an existing culture (that is, a supplemental culture), or a culture that replaces an existing .NET Framework culture. 在每個案例中，基本的步驟都相同：In each case, the basic steps are the same: 1. 具現化物件，藉由呼叫其建構函式。Instantiate a object by calling its constructor. 若要取代現有的文化特性，傳遞該文化特性的名稱和建構函式的列舉值。To replace an existing culture, pass that culture's name and the enumeration value to the constructor. 若要建立新的文化特性或補充的文化特性，傳遞唯一的文化特性名稱，然後或列舉值。To create a new culture or a supplemental culture, pass a unique culture name and either the or enumeration value. > [!NOTE] > 如果您使用列舉值，以具現化物件，物件的屬性會自動填入的值来被取代的物件。If you use the enumeration value to instantiate a object, the object's properties are automatically populated with values from the object to be replaced. 2. 如果您要建立新的或補充的文化特性：If you are creating a new or supplemental culture: - 填入物件的屬性，藉由呼叫方法並傳遞其屬性值會類似於您的新物件的物件。Populate the object's properties by calling the method and passing a object whose property values are similar to your new object. - 填入藉由呼叫物件的區域屬性方法並傳遞物件，表示您的自訂文化特性的區域。Populate the object's regional properties by calling the method and passing a object that represents the region of your custom culture. 3. 修改的內容視物件。Modify the properties of the object as necessary. 4. 如果您打算註冊自訂的文化特性在不同的常式，呼叫方法。If you are planning to register the custom culture in a separate routine, call the method. 這會產生 XML 檔案，您可以載入並註冊個別的自訂文化特性安裝常式中。This generates an XML file that you can load and register in a separate custom culture installation routine. ## 註冊自訂的文化特性Registering a Custom Culture 如果您正在開發不同應用程式的自訂文化特性的註冊應用程式，會建立文化特性，您呼叫方法來載入 XML 檔案，其中包含自訂文化特性的定義，並具現化物件。If you are developing a registration application for a custom culture that is separate from the application that creates the culture, you call the method to load the XML file that contains the custom culture's definition and instantiate the object. 若要處理的註冊，請呼叫方法。To handle the registration, call the method. 登錄才能成功，會註冊自訂的文化特性的應用程式必須以系統管理權限上執行目標系統中;否則，呼叫會擲回例外狀況。For the registration to succeed, the application that registers the custom culture must be running with administrative privileges on the target system; otherwise, the call to throws an exception. > [!WARNING] > 文化特性的資料可能會不同系統之間。Culture data can differ between systems. 如果您使用類別來建立跨多個的系統，和統一的自訂文化特性建立您的自訂文化特性中現有的資料載入和物件和自訂，您應該開發兩個不同的公用程式。If you are using the class to create a custom culture that is uniform across multiple systems and you are creating your custom culture by loading data from existing and objects and customizing it, you should develop two different utilities. 第一個建立的自訂文化特性，並將它儲存至 XML 檔案。The first creates the custom culture and saves it to an XML file. 第二個使用方法來載入自訂的文化特性，從 XML 檔案，並註冊目標電腦上。The second uses the method to load the custom culture from an XML file and register it on the target computer. 註冊程序會執行下列工作：The registration process performs the following tasks: - 會建立包含資訊中所定義的.nlp 檔案物件。Creates an .nlp file that contains the information that is defined in the object. - 在目標電腦上 %windir%\Globalization 系統目錄中儲存.nlp 檔案。Stores the .nlp file in the %windir%\Globalization system directory on the target computer. 這可讓自訂文化特性設定，以工作階段之間保存。This enables the custom culture's settings to persist between sessions. (方法需要系統管理權限，因為.nlp 檔案儲存在系統目錄。)(The method requires administrative privileges because the .nlp file is stored in a system directory.) - 準備要在下一次搜尋 %windir%\Globalization 系統目錄，而不是內部快取的.NET Framework 有建立新的自訂文化特性的要求。Prepares the .NET Framework to search the %windir%\Globalization system directory instead of an internal cache the next time there is a request to create your new custom culture. 已成功註冊的自訂文化特性時，就區別預先定義之.NET Framework 文化特性。When a custom culture is successfully registered, it is indistinguishable from the cultures that are predefined by the .NET Framework. 自訂文化特性可呼叫方法會從本機電腦移除.nlp 檔案。The custom culture is available until a call to the method removes the .nlp file from the local computer. ## 具現化自訂文化特性Instantiating a Custom Culture 您可以建立自訂的文化特性的執行個體中的下列方法之一：You can create an instance of the custom culture in one of the following ways: - 藉由叫用建構函式使用的文化特性名稱。By invoking the constructor with the culture name. - 藉由呼叫與文化特性名稱的方法。By calling the method with the culture name. - 藉由呼叫與文化特性名稱的方法。By calling the method with the culture name. 此外，陣列所傳回的物件方法包含自訂的文化特性。In addition, the array of objects that is returned by the method includes the custom culture. ## Examples 下列範例會定義自訂的 ru 美國文化特性，表示在美國境內的俄文語言。The following example defines a custom ru-US culture that represents the Russian language in the United States. 此範例會藉由從俄文 （俄羅斯） 載入設定定義自訂的文化特性物件和美國物件，然後再設定一些屬性。The example defines the custom culture by loading settings from the Russian (Russia) object and the U.S. object, and then sets a number of properties. 此範例會註冊自訂的文化特性，然後加以具現化，並將目前執行緒文化特性。The example registers the custom culture, and then instantiates it and makes it the current thread culture. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.CultureAndRegionInfoBuilder.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.cultureandregioninfobuilder.class/cs/car.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.CultureAndRegionInfoBuilder.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.cultureandregioninfobuilder.class/vb/car.vb#1)]

span.span: The name of a culture.

param.name: flags
param.span: 其中一個 值，指定新的 物件是否為中性文化特性、是否取代現有的文化特性和國家/地區，或者是新的文化特性。

span.span: One of the values that specifies whether the new object is a neutral culture, replaces an existing culture and country/region, or is a new culture.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `cultureName`參數指定新名稱物件。The `cultureName` parameter specifies the name of the new object. `flags`參數用於值，指定是否新物件是新的自訂文化特性，或取代現有的中性文化特性、 特定文化特性或 Windows 地區設定。The `flags` parameter is used for a value that specifies whether the new object is a new custom culture, or replaces an existing neutral culture, specific culture, or Windows locale. 如果`cultureName`參數指定現有的.NET Framework 文化特性，已登錄之自訂文化特性或 Windows 地區設定中，從產生的文化特性建構函式會自動填入新不因文化特性的物件和國家/地區資訊。If the `cultureName` parameter specifies an existing .NET Framework culture, registered custom culture, or culture generated from a Windows locale, the constructor automatically populates the new object with culture and country/region information. 填入新叫用物件的文化特性和國家/地區資訊和方法。Populate the new object with culture and country/region information by invoking the and methods. ## 自訂文化特性名稱Custom Culture Names 慣用的格式`cultureName`新的自訂文化特性的參數是"[`prefix`-]`language`[-`region`] [-`suffix`[`…`]]"，其中`language`元件是必要的和`prefix`，`region`，和`suffix`元件是選擇性的。The preferred format of the `cultureName` parameter for a new, custom culture is "[`prefix`-]`language`[-`region`][-`suffix`[`…`]]", where the `language` component is required and the `prefix`, `region`, and `suffix` components are optional. 每個元件的最大長度是 8 個字元和最大長度的整個`cultureName`參數為 84 個字元。The maximum length of each component is 8 characters and the maximum length of the entire `cultureName` parameter is 84 characters. `prefix`元件是 Internet 指派 Numbers Authority (IANA) 識別。The `prefix` component is the Internet Assigned Numbers Authority (IANA) identification. 指定 「 i-」 或 「 我-」 向 IANA，或"x"或"X"的文化特性名稱私用的文化特性名稱。Specify "i-" or "I-" for culture names registered with the IANA, or "x-" or "X-" for culture names reserved for private use. 否則，不需要前置詞。Otherwise, the prefix is not required. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 RFC 4646，"Tags for the Identification of Languages"。For more information, see RFC 4646, "Tags for the Identification of Languages." `language`元件`cultureName`參數會指定衍生自 ISO 639-1，小寫雙字母代碼和`region`指定衍生自 ISO 3166 的大寫雙字母代碼。The `language` component of the `cultureName` parameter specifies a lowercase two-letter code derived from ISO 639-1, and `region` specifies an uppercase two-letter code derived from ISO 3166. 例如，EN-US 代表英文中是在美國境內。For example, en-US stands for English as spoken in the United States. 如果沒有`region`元件表示中性文化特性。The absence of the `region` component signifies a neutral culture. A`cultureName`也就是相同的.NET Framework 隨附文化特性名稱表示取代 （覆寫） 的文化特性。A `cultureName` that is the same as the name of a culture included with the .NET Framework signifies a replacement (override) culture. 可取代的文化特性的屬性指派的值為有限的。The values that can be assigned to the properties of a replacement culture are limited. 如需這類限制的詳細資訊，請參閱每一個屬性的例外狀況。For more information about such limitations, see the exceptions for each property. 應用程式使用`suffix`區分類似的文化特性的元件。The application uses the `suffix` component to distinguish similar cultures. 例如，兩家公司，ABC 和 XYZ，建立並共用新的 ASP.NET Web 服務，以提升他們在世界各地不同的市場中的產品。For example, two companies, ABC and XYZ, create and share a new ASP.NET Web service to promote their products in different markets around the world. 網頁服務的顯示區域的標誌和每一家公司，根據使用者的文化特性的當地電話號碼等資訊。The Web pages for the service display information such as the regional logo and local telephone number of each company depending on the user's culture. 每個網頁的特定文化特性的內容是在個別的資源檔的文化特性名稱來識別，而且由公司名稱所限定。The culture-specific content for each Web page is in separate resource files identified by culture name and qualified by company name. 比方說，EN-US 和 JA-JP 文化特性的資源檔會命名為 en-us-US-ABC、 XYZ-英文-美國、 日本-JP-ABC 和日本-JP-XYZ。For example, resource files for the en-US and ja-JP cultures are named en-US-ABC, en-US-XYZ, ja-JP-ABC, and ja-JP-XYZ. "ABC"和"XYZ"後置詞啟用 Web 服務使用相同的應用程式邏輯，以顯示不同的市場特定資訊。The "ABC" and "XYZ" suffixes enable the Web service to use the same application logic to display different market-specific information. `suffix`元件可以包含子元件，其中每一個子元件以連字號分隔，而每一個子元件的最大長度是 8 個字元。The `suffix` component can consist of subcomponents, where each subcomponent is delimited by a hyphen and the maximum length of each subcomponent is 8 characters. 例如，如果 「 英文-美國-honda-cars] 是`cultureName`參數，[-honda-cars 」 是`suffix`元件。For example, if "en-US-honda-cars" is the `cultureName` parameter, "-honda-cars" is the `suffix` component. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用私用前置詞，建立自訂的文化特性，然後列出它的屬性集。The following code example creates a custom culture with a private use prefix, then lists a set of its properties. 第一個屬性列出的文化特性名稱。The first property lists the name of the culture. [!code-cpp[sys.glob.carib1#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/sys.glob.carib1/CPP/carib.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[sys.glob.carib1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/sys.glob.carib1/CS/carib.cs#1)] [!code-vb[sys.glob.carib1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/sys.glob.carib1/VB/carib.vb#1)]

span.span: Gets or sets an alternate user interface culture suitable for console applications when the default graphic user interface culture is inappropriate.

value.span: 替代的文化特性，用來在主控台上讀取和顯示文字。

span.span: An alternate culture that is used to read and display text on the console.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 get 作業中，屬性會對應至方法。In a get operation, the property corresponds to the method. 指定`null`在設定作業中指出的文化特性定義目前物件是替代的使用者介面文化特性。Specify `null` in a set operation to indicate that the culture defined by the current object is the alternate user interface culture. 如果您嘗試將屬性設定為本身有不同的主控台後援 UI 文化特性的文化特性，然後它會指派該最終 「 分葉 」 文化特性。If you attempt to set the property to a culture that itself has a different Console Fallback UI Culture, then it will be assigned that final "leaf" culture. 阿拉伯文、 希伯來文、 波斯文、 烏都文和敘利亞文等語言是以雙向文字為基礎。Languages such as Arabic, Hebrew, Persian, Urdu and Syriac are based on bi-directional text. Windows 應用程式，採用的圖形化使用者介面，支援雙向語言。Windows applications, which employ a graphical user interface, support bi-directional languages. 不過，主控台應用程式，運用作業系統主控台的文字使用者介面，不提供雙向的支援。However, console applications, which employ the text user interface of the operating system console, do not provide bi-directional support. 因此，如果主控台應用程式已當地語系化為阿拉伯文或希伯來文，它會顯示無法讀取文字主控台畫面上。Consequently, if a console application is localized to Arabic or Hebrew, it displays unreadable text on the console screen. 使用者介面文化特性會指定應用程式需要支援、 使用者輸入和輸出，而且預設是作業系統的文化特性相同的資源。The user interface culture specifies the resources that an application needs to support user input and output, and by default is the same as the operating system culture. 比方說，屬性會傳回適用於阿拉伯文作業系統的阿拉伯文化特性。For example, the property returns an Arabic culture for an Arabic operating system. 應用程式應該使用屬性來擷取適用於主控台應用程式使用者介面是中性文化特性。The application should use the property to retrieve a neutral culture suitable for a console application user interface.

XML 檔案的格式稱為地區設定資料標記語言 (LDML) 1.1 版。The format of the XML file is called Locale Data Markup Language (LDML) version 1.1. 新物件是建立和使用中的資料初始化`xmlFileName`。A new object is created and initialized with the data in `xmlFileName`. 方法會執行的反向作業方法。The method performs the reverse operation of the method. 在 LDML 檔案中，不因文化特性的屬性會指定為子項目的``中的項目``一節。In the LDML file, the properties of a culture are specified as child elements of the `` element in the `` section. 屬性值通常由項目的`type`屬性。A property value is typically specified by the element's `type` attribute. 比方說，LDML 檔案中的下列摘錄英文的中性文化特性來定義文化特性的父代。For example, the following excerpt from an LDML file defines a culture's parent as the English neutral culture. ```xml ldml version 1.1 ``` 如需詳細的 LDML 標準的詳細資訊，請參閱[Unicode 技術標準 #35、 「 地區設定資料標記語言 (LDML)"](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=252840) Unicode 協會網站上。For more information about the LDML standard, see [Unicode Technical Standard #35, "Locale Data Markup Language (LDML)"](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=252840) on the Unicode Consortium website. ## Examples 下列範例示範和方法。The following example demonstrates the and methods. summary.span: 取得或設定文化特性名稱，其格式是根據 RFC 4646 標準＜Tags for the Identification of Languages＞。

span.span: Gets or sets a culture name formatted according to the RFC 4646 standard, "Tags for the Identification of Languages."

value.span: 根據 RFC 4646 設定格式的文化特性名稱。

span.span: A culture name formatted according to RFC 4646.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性取得或設定文化特性名稱，根據 RFC 4646，可能會不同於所傳回的文化特性名稱格式化屬性。The property gets or sets a culture name formatted according to RFC 4646, which can be different from the culture name returned by the property. 比方說，在.NET Framework 1.0 版中，包括繁體中文的中性文化特性名稱是"ZH-CHT 」。For example, in the .NET Framework version 1.0, the neutral culture name for Traditional Chinese was "zh-CHT". 相反地，RFC 4646"ZH-HANT 」 來定義該文化特性名稱。In contrast, RFC 4646 defines that culture name as "zh-HANT". （請注意在.NET Framework 第 4 版中，「 ZH-CHT"的顯示名稱是"中文 （繁體） 舊版"）。(Note that in the .NET Framework version 4, the Display Name for "zh-CHT" is "Chinese (Traditional) Legacy".) RFC 4646 文化特性名稱是由數個元件所組成。An RFC 4646 culture name consists of several components. 典型的文化特性名稱是由必要的語言識別項、 選擇性的指令碼識別項和選擇性的國家/地區識別碼所組成。A typical culture name consists of a mandatory language identifier, an optional script identifier, and an optional country/region identifier. 比方說，塞爾維亞文語言、 斯拉夫文的指令碼和塞爾維亞地區的有效 RFC 4646 文化特性名稱是"sr-Cyrl-RS"。For example, a valid RFC 4646 culture name for the Serbian language, the Cyrillic script, and the region of Serbia is "sr-Cyrl-RS". 請注意，有兩個或多個文化特性相同的 IETF 語言標記。Note that two or more cultures can have the same IETF language tag. 詳細資訊，請參閱 RFC 4646，「 標記的識別的語言，」，網址[要求的註解](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=45286)。For more information, see RFC 4646, "Tags for the Identification of Languages," at [Request For Comments](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=45286).

summary.span: 取得或設定 物件，表示目前自訂文化特性的父文化特性。

span.span: Gets or sets the object that represents the parent culture of the current custom culture.

value.span: 物件，表示目前自訂文化特性的父文化特性。

span.span: The object that represents the parent culture of the current custom culture.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 文化特性具有階層。The cultures have a hierarchy. 預先定義的文化特性的父代特定文化特性是中性文化特性，而是中性文化特性的父代為。For predefined cultures, the parent of a specific culture is a neutral culture and the parent of a neutral culture is the . 父文化特性，涵蓋了只是在其子系之間常見的資訊集。The parent culture encompasses only the set of information that is common among its children. 通常建議的自訂文化特性都符合這個階層架構。It is generally recommended that custom cultures conform to this hierarchy. 不過，根據預設，的自訂文化特性是所依據的文化特性。However, by default, the of a custom culture is the of the culture on which it is based. 如果應用程式會建立具有文化特性「 英文-美國-MyCulture"基礎"EN-US"，其父代為"en"，因為那是的"EN-US"。If the application creates a culture with "en-US-MyCulture" based on "en-US", its parent is "en" because that is the of "en-US". 如果應用程式會使用"EN-US"作為新的自訂文化特性，它必須明確將此值。If the application uses "en-US" as the of the new custom culture, it must set this value explicitly. 如果特定的文化特性的資源不是系統所提供的則會使用中性文化特性的資源。If the resources for the specific culture are not available in the system, the resources for the neutral culture are used. 如果無法使用中性文化特性的資源時，會使用內嵌於主要組件中的資源。If the resources for the neutral culture are not available, the resources embedded in the main assembly are used. 如需有關資源後援處理序的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 封裝和部署資源](~/docs/framework/resources/packaging-and-deploying-resources-in-desktop-apps.md)。For more information about the resource fallback process, see [Packaging and Deploying Resources](~/docs/framework/resources/packaging-and-deploying-resources-in-desktop-apps.md). Windows API 中的文化特性的清單是稍微不同的.NET Framework 中的文化特性的清單。The list of cultures in the Windows API is slightly different from the list of cultures in the .NET Framework. 如果需要與 Windows 的互通性，例如，透過平台叫用的機制，應用程式應該使用.NET Framework 中定義特定文化特性。If interoperability with Windows is required, for example, through the platform invoke mechanism, the application should use a specific culture that is defined in the .NET Framework. 這可確保與對等的 Windows 地區設定，這具有相同識別的一致性。This ensures consistency with the equivalent Windows locale, which is identified with the same .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會對應至屬性。The property corresponds to the property. 屬性值是其中一個國家/地區在 ISO 3166 中定義的兩個字母代碼。The property value is one of the two-letter codes defined in ISO 3166 for country/region. 例如，美國的兩個字母代碼是 「 我們的 」。For example, the two-letter code for United States is "US". 預先定義名稱會列在類別主題。The predefined names are listed in the class topic.

summary.span: 從本機電腦刪除自訂的文化特性。

span.span: Deletes a custom culture from the local computer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會執行的反向方法。The method does the reverse of the method. 方法會將自訂的文化特性儲存為 Win32 API 所傳回的目錄的全球化子目錄中的本機電腦上的檔案[GetWindowsDirectory](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=191561)函式。The method stores a custom culture as a file on the local computer, in the Globalization subdirectory of the directory returned by the Win32 API [GetWindowsDirectory](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=191561) function. 方法會從電腦刪除持續性的自訂文化特性的檔案。The method deletes the persisted custom culture file from the computer. 刪除檔案之後，在電腦記憶體中的自訂文化特性的現有執行個體繼續運作，但無法建立自訂的文化特性的新執行個體。After the file is deleted, existing instances of the custom culture in computer memory continue to work, but new instances of the custom culture cannot be created. ## Examples 下列範例示範方法。The following example demonstrates the method. [!code-csharp[sys.glob.carib.unregister#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/sys.glob.carib.unregister/CS/unregister.cs#1)] [!code-vb[sys.glob.carib.unregister#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/sys.glob.carib.unregister/VB/unregister.vb#1)]
